TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPagerFieldTypeEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a visual editor for fields.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DataPagerFieldTypeEditor class provides a visual editor that is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: Context information about the design environment.
A reference to the associated designer.
Docs.summary: Displays the visual editor by using the style that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: Context information about the design environment.
Docs.summary: Gets the style that the editor will use.
Docs.returns: One of the enumeration values that indicates the type of style that the editor will use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method indicates the editor style that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method and will always return `UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal`.
